channel.title: Comments on: Theme Song
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: I can't stop thinking about it either... it's just been stuck in my mind for about a year now.. :)Then, Dave had a Salome shirt the next day!Monica, it's on the Old 97s CD, Too Far to Care... track 4, I think.
item.content:encoded: I can’t stop thinking about it either… it’s just been stuck in my mind for about a year now.. :)Then, Dave had a Salome shirt the next day!Monica, it’s on the Old 97s CD, Too Far to Care… track 4, I think.

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: HOw does one find such cool tuneage? I am looking...but I'm being thwarted. Help?Monica
item.content:encoded: HOw does one find such cool tuneage? I am looking…but I’m being thwarted. Help?Monica
